summary: This mod will change the required condition for the guards to comment your armor/ weapons.
descriptionHtml:
Name: Guard\'s Equipment comment tweak
Version: 1.0
Date: 9/01/2012
Category: NPCs
Author(s): Vroix
Source: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20414

Description
===========
This mod will change the required condition for the guards to comment your armor/ weapons.


Details
=======
In vanilla Skyrim, most guards will comment on your armor and weapons (swords mostly) according to what kind of armor you wear. Usually they comment on the material the armor/ weapon is made of. Then, you start installing some new armors/ weapons from other mods and then you notice the guard stop commenting on your armor/ weapons.
This happen because the condition for that comment to show up is the player must equip the exact armor (i.e guards will comment about how unreliable iron sword is IF you equip vanilla iron sword).
If you want the guards to keep commenting your equipment while wearing armor/ weapons from other mods, then this mod is for you.
What this mod does is simply change the required condition of the comment from \"based on equipping the exact armor/ weapons\" to \"material based\" of the armor or weapons.
for example, in vanilla the guard will comment about your steel sword because you equip the exact \'steel sword\', if you wear another sword made of steel from another mod, the guard will stop giving comments. Now after you activate this mod, the guard will still give comment on your sword whether you\'re equipping the vanilla steel sword, steel katana from \'Weapons of Third Era\" or even Bastard Sword from \"Jaysus Sword\".

To put it simply, before you install this mod :
1, Guard\'s comment on sword will show up only if you equip the exact vanilla sword (iron sword/ elven sword/ ebony sword/ steel sword).
2. Guard\'s comment on armor will show up only if you wear the exact cuirass (iron armor/ iron banded/ dwarven armor/ dragonplate cuirass/ dragonscale cuirass/ leather armor/ hide armor/ steel armor/ steel plate armor/ orcish armor/ scaled armor).

After you install this mod :
1, Guard\'s comment on sword will show up if you equip any sword that is categorized as iron/ steel/ elven/ ebony/ daedric.
2. Guard\'s comment on armor will show up if you wear at least 3 apparel (normally chest, boots, and gloves) categorized as iron/ steel/ steel plate/ dwarven/ leather/ hide/ ebony/ orcish/ scaled/ daedric/ dragonplate/ dragonscale.

Now with the new version, Guard\'s comment about skill will change too. It will not depends on player\'s skill level anymore (except for magics skill). I do this because I think it\'s a little weird that guards comment about your skill based on skill level (comment about light armor skill even if I don\'t wear light armor at all). Detailed explanation :
One Handed Weapon Skill Comment : will show up if you wear any kind of one handed weapon.
Two Handed Weapon Skill Comment : will show up if you wear any kind of two handed weapon.
Heavy/ Light Armor Skill Comment : will show up if you wear at least 3 pieces of the corresponding armor (3 pieces of light armor/ 3 pieces of heavy armor).
Archery Skill Comment : will show up if you wear any kind of bow.
Speech Skill Comment : will show up if you have successfully persuade people 50 times.
Barter (Speech) Skill Comment : will show up if you have traded with merchants for at least 200 times.
Sneaking Skill Comment : will show up if you have tresspass more than 25 times. The other comment will show up if you have more than 50 sneak attacks on your misc stat.
Alchemist Skill Comment : will show up if you have made 50 potions and 50 poisons.
Enchanting Skill Comment : will show up if you have enchant more than 50 weapons.
Pickpocket Skill Comment : will show up if you have pickpocket more than 50 times.
Lockpcik Skill Comment : will show up if you have picked more than 50 locks.
All Magic School Comment : will show up if the corresponding skill level is at least 75.

If the above settings are awkward or doesn\'t make any sense, feel free to give me suggestion. I might consider it.

Optional file is also available for those who doesn\'t want the skill comment to change or perhaps prefer other alternatives.

If you\'re updating, please uninstall the previous version first and create a clean save.

Load Order
==========
BOSS will not recognize this (yet), however you can put this in your userlist.txt

ADD: Vrx Guards Equipment Comment Tweak.esp
BOTTOM: Overrides V

Or if you\'re familiar with BOSS Userlist Manager, you can edit it with that.

Nexus Mod Manager Install
=========================
1. Select this mod, then click the install button.
2. Make sure the .esp file is activated.
3. Arrange the load order.
4. Start Skyrim.

Manual Install
==============
1. Extract the files to a temporary location.
2. Examine the folder structure and make corrections where necessary.
3. Copy files to (install folder)\\Skyrim\\Data\\
4. Start Skyrim Launcher, click \'Data Files\', place a checkmark beside the .esp file.

Nexus Mod Manager Uninstall
===========================
1. Select this mod on your Nexus Mod Manager, click the uninstall button.
2. Delete the mod.

Manual Uninstall
================
1. Start Skyrim Launcher, click Data Files, uncheck the .esp file.
2. Delete the files/folders associated with the mod.

Incompatibility
===============
Will be incompatible with mods that alter the same dialogue with this mod (DialogueGuardsGeneral).
At the moment, this mod will be incompatible with Eckss\'s Guard\'s Dialogue Overhaul.

Known Issues or Bugs
====================
1. Sometimes the guard will still give you comment if you only wear helmet, boots, and gauntlets (without cuirass) of the same material.

History
=======
0.1 (07/13/2012)
First Release
• Edit the required condition to show up the following comments :
- Hide Armor
- Leather Armor
- Iron & Iron banded armor
- Steel Armor
- Scaled Armor
- Steel Plate Armor
- Studded Armor
- Dwarven Armor
- Orcish Armor
- Ebony Armor
- Dragonplate Armor
- Dragonscale Armor
- Iron Swords
- Steel Swords
- Elven Swords

• Add the following comments :
- Daedric Armor (used the nightingale comment)
- Daedric Swords (used the ebony sword comment)

1.0 (09/01/2012)
Rebuild the mod from scratch, rename the esp.
Changed the skill comments to be a little more immersive (not depend on player\'s skill level anymore).
Add optional version for the skill comments.

Contact
=======
You can find me on Skyrim Nexus as Vroix


Credits
=======
Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
Thanks to skyrim.nexusmods.com for the a one-stop-shop resource for authors and players.
Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file was based on.
Thanks to Darklordroy, his mod inspire me to alter the skill comments.
Thanks to God for creating us all.

Tools Used
==========
Creation Kit
7-Zip - http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=15579
Readme Generator - http://HammondsLegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp

Licensing/Legal
===============
You can do whatever you want with this mod but all I ask in return is that
you give me credit if you distribute any part of this mod. I would also like
to know what mods are including my work.
